Ad.Title: Ski-Doo Ski-Doo Expedition Xtreme 900 ACE Turbo R (SKU-ADTD-2026) 2026 X
Ad.Description:
Модель: Ski-Doo Expedition Xtreme 900 ACE Turbo R Двигатель: 850 E-TEC Гусеница: 154in/3900mm Запуск: Electric Приборы: 4.5 in. Digital Display Цвет: Black
Описание: The Ski-Doo Expedition Xtreme 900 ACE Turbo R is a high-performance crossover snowmobile designed for both trail riding and deep snow exploration. With its powerful turbocharged engine, advanced suspension, and versatile track, it caters to experienced riders seeking an exhilarating and capable machine that can handle a variety of terrain and conditions. Объем двигателя: 899 куб.см Мощность: 150 л.с.
✅ Официальная гарантия ✅ Доставка по России ✅ Сертифицированный дилер BRP
Ad.Model: Ski-Doo Expedition Xtreme 900 ACE Turbo R
